name: BOLD
description: BOLD is an AI-enhanced prediction market built on Solana, enabling users to trade on real-world outcomes with dynamic multiplier-based conviction scoring. By combining scalable on-chain infrastructure with AI-driven market modeling, BOLD offers fast settlement, risk-adjusted pricing, and up to 100x leveraged positions. The platform expands prediction markets beyond speculation, providing data insights, liquidity incentives, and a high-performance ecosystem for traders, analysts, and builders.
